message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. It's a great deal for both of us, as you know it's worth significantly more to you. Let me know your thoughts.

Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe I can't justify spending $1,150,000 on it. I am willing to pay up to $1,050,000 for the product. Please let me know if this is within your consideration.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I understand your position, I need to make a bit more to justify selling. I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.  Let me know if you're interested.

Alice, I've considered your latest offer and while I understand your perspective, I still feel that $1,100,000 is too high for me. I would like to propose $1,075,000 as a compromise. I hope this aligns better with your valuation of the product.
